description.raw: As discussed in #48, if a package has components with a dependency relationship (such as ign-physics-dartsim-plugin, which depends on ignition-physics-sdf and ignition-physics-mesh), then then all the components must be listed in the ign_find_package call and in a proper order. This pull request includes an example of this issue in which components are specified in the proper order. The failing case is included in a separate branch ([find_component_order](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/branch/find_component_order?dest=find_component_order_working#diff)) that only differs in the order in which components are specified in the `ign_find_package` call.
description.html: As discussed in #48, if a package has components with a dependency relationship (such as ign-physics-dartsim-plugin, which depends on ignition-physics-sdf and ignition-physics-mesh), then then all the components must be listed in the ign_find_package call and in a proper order. This pull request includes an example of this issue in which components are specified in the proper order. The failing case is included in a separate branch (find_component_order) that only differs in the order in which components are specified in the ign_find_package call.
